983500.name: Gnomes Garden Soundtrack
983500.description:
Dear friend!
Have you ever dreamt about being in a fantasy world and feeling like one of the characters?! You can go on a trip to the world of Gnomes Garden at any time!
We have collected for you magic soundtracks, which will help to feel the atmosphere of a magical journey .

List of soundtracks that will lead you into Gnomes world:
Track 1 - 01:51
Track 2 - 01:46
Track 3 - 02:07
Track 4 - 00:44
Track 5 - 00:39

Note:
All soundtrack are in the format .mp3
Album's soundtrack will be placed in a folder containing the game Gnomes Garden Lost King
983500.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语, 德语
